description:
Used to working alone, Najica balks at being assigned a rookie partner, especially when that partner turns out to be Lila, the Humaritt (artificial human) girl that she rescued on her last mission. 
Their first assignment as a team is to protect a dignitary`s daughter from a notorious assassin. But will Lila prove a help or a hindrance to the mission?

titles.title: A Pretty Partner with a Gun in her Hands
Die hübsche Partnerin und ihre magische Kugel
Karen no Partner wa Utsukushiki Dangan to Tomo ni
可憐なパートナーは美しき弾丸と共に
